title: Rock the vote, phase 1
body:
Ok, here's the current list of potential shirt slogans. Please list your favorite(s) in the comment section of this post, but try to limit it to five slogans or less. The voting will end tomorrow when I post the top slogans (probably around this same time). So, if you didn't vote in November, now's the time to redeem yourself. Vote, vote, VOTE!

  1. The Moxie: The New Black

  2. The Moxie, where the amps turn up to 11

  3. Everything's coming up Moxie!

  4. The Moxie: Like a fat kid on an M&M!

  5. The Moxie: How much fried chicken can you eat?

  6. The Moxie: You know how I roll.

  7. Show me The Moxie!

  8. It took Moxie to get this shirt.

  9. I have more Moxie in my shirt than you have in your entire body.

  10. The Moxie gots mad skills.

  11. Fact: Chicks dig The Moxie.

  12. There's no place like The Moxie.

  13. Do you know what they call a Quarter Pounder with Cheese at The Moxie? ... a Quarter Pounder with Cheese.

  14. His prose has moxie, though it rushes and stumbles from a pent-up surge.

  15. Opening in late 2004, February, March SOON

  16. Go back to MOXIE, bitch. (Donnie Darko)

  17. The first rule of MOXIE is: You do not talk about MOXIE.

  18. You're not your f@!**ing MOXIE

  19. Jokers to the left of me, clowns to the right, here I am stuck in the MOXIE with you. (from Reservoir Dogs)

  20. Le MOXIE with cheese. (Pulp Fiction)

  21. Fat, drunk, and MOXIE is no way to go through life, son. (Animal House)

  22. Tina, you fat lard, come get some MOXIE! (Napoleon Dynamite)

  23. Vote for Moxie (take-off of Napoleon's 'Vote for Pedro' tee)

  24. FRONT: "I want the MOXIE!!" BACK: "You can't handle the MOXIE!"

  25. Y Tu Moxie Tambien

  26. Poor people showing movies to rich people who pay them.

  27. I've sold The Moxie to Springfield, Shelbyville, and North Haverbrook, and it put them on the map.

  28. Moxie: Changing Movies One Flick At A Time

  29. I Saw A Great Movie At The Moxie And All I Got Was This Lousy T-Shirt.

  30. In Soviet Russia, The Moxie Goes To You!

  31. All Your Moxie Belong To Us

  32. The Moxie: Theater Is As Theater Does

  33. Crouching Movie, Hidden Moxie

  34. The Only Real Currency In This Bankrupt World Is What We Share With Each Other At The Moxie

  35. Full Metal Moxie

  36. The Moxie: When Independent Gets Dependent

  37. What Wilco Is To Music, The Moxie Is To Independent Cinema

  38. The Moxie: A Dare To Be Great Situation

  39. Moxie Chops.

  40. Miracle on Walnut Street.

  41. Bad Boys II: Now playing somewhere that is not The Moxie.

  42. He asked me to forcibly insert the Moxie into my anus!

  43. We'll always have Moxie. (Casablanca)

  44. Meet me in Moxie. (Eternal Sunshine)

  45. Oh for pete's sake, he's fleeing the Moxie! He's feeling the Moxie! (Fargo)

  46. For relaxing times, make it Moxie times. (Lost in Translation)

  47. Gee, I wish I had one of them Moxie machines. (Dr. Strangelove)

  48. Sometimes I doubt your commitment to Moxie. (Donnie Darko)

  49. I just want to say one word to you - just one word.... Moxie.

  50. Moxie, for lack of a better word, is good.

  51. Can I have 10,000 Moxies please?

  52. Of all the picture shows in all the towns in all the world, she walks into mine.

  53. Forget it, Jake, it's Moxietown.

  54. All work and no Moxie makes Jack a dull boy (repeat across front and back)

  55. The Moxie: Now Keanu Free!

  56. Go to The Moxie! Because Beer Makes Every Movie Better

  57. The Moxie: It's a soda! It's an independent theater! It's BOTH!

  58. The Moxie: Working to make southwest Missouri less desolate one film at a time.

  59. The Moxie: I knew you when you were Cinema24

  60. FRONT: Moxie Cinema SMALL PRINT: best viewed in firefox BACK: independent Cinema, independent browser

  61. M0x13 ç1n3m4: ƒ0r £33+ v13w3r$

  62. The Moxie: dang dong

  63. The Moxie teaches the under privileged

  64. The Moxie wiped my butt when i was a child

  65. The Moxie: safe to bring home to the family

  66. The Moxie and Springfield, friends 4 life

  67. The Moxie is my cocaine

  68. I have to take a big hairy Moxie

  69. The Moxie loves bunnies

  70. FRONT: The Moxie BACK: We do it with an audience

  71. The Moxie was born a poor black child.

  72. Lord loves The Moxie; don't trust whitey; see a doctor and get rid of it.

  73. In Springfield, The Moxie is more dangerous than shotguns.

  74. Let me tell you something my friend: The Moxie is a dangerous thing. The Moxie can drive a man insane.

  75. I got to second in the back of The Moxie.

  76. How do you like The Moxie: neat or on the rocks?

  77. If you build the MOXIE, they will come.

  78. $moxie = "SELECT * FROM `theaters` WHERE `coolness` = 'through_the_friggin_roof';"

  79. One screen to rule them all
    One screen to find them.
    One screen to bring them all
    And in the darkness show various flicks that we would not normally get in a small to mid-sized, conservative market such as this.

  80. All your Moxie are belong to us.

  81. Your hat is at The Moxie.
author: Dan

comments.author: Justin
comments.body: Are we allowed to vote for new options that aren't  listed above?  If so, I vote for Moxie logo on the front, and "Where's my hat?" on the back.  If not, I'll vote for #5 and #14.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Try to keep it to the ones listed above.

comments.author: Tawny
comments.body:
17 The first rule of Moxie is you do not talk about The Moxie
23 Vote for Moxie
41 Bad Boys II: Now playing somewhere that is not The Moxie
55 The Moxie: Now Keanu Free!

comments.author: Emily the Marketing Dork
comments.body: In this order: 58, 56, 25, 47, 48.

comments.author: Evan Erwin
comments.body: 12, 38 (yes, I'm a whore who votes for his own submissions...but just that one submission), 17, 46, 60

comments.author: Dave Adams
comments.body: I have to vote for #15. I might have gone with #31 except it should be "All your Moxie are belong to us".

comments.author: Evan Erwin
comments.body:
Yeah, I was claiming geek cred when I was missing a crucial engrish piece in the sentence.

I am forever shamed and get -1 Geek Points for today.

comments.author: muddgirl
comments.body:
In no particular order:

75 52 26 15 6

damn, these are funny.

comments.author: Matt L
comments.body: My picks would be 58, 7, and 28 though i'd love to see  78 and 59. however - i get the feeling those two wouldn't be very big sellers.

comments.author: Allison
comments.body:
These are my 4 favorites, in order of favoritisim:
59,58,36,75

comments.author: Liz
comments.body: 15, 17, 59, and either 81 or Justin's suggestion above.

comments.author: Sam Spade
comments.body:
1 The Moxie: The New Black
8 It took Moxie to get this shirt
25 Y Tu Moxie Tambien
54 All work and no Moxie makes Jack a dull boy (repeat across front and back)

comments.author: jamie
comments.body:
Here it goes:

13: I like it, but I think you should record Nicole saying it with her little laugh at the end! Much more funny.

36: Again, I'm a nerdy math teacher!

23, 75,77

comments.author: Justin
comments.body: And how might you get the recording of Nicole saying it onto the t-shirt?

comments.author: Mada
comments.body: Nothing is standing out at me, but, to be tasteful for all parties involved:  29, 42, 70, 75, 80.

comments.author: jamie
comments.body: um... it would'nt be for a t-shirt.  It could be during the previews.  Obviously!

comments.author: steph v.
comments.body:
I like the new black and the fight club reference...

although since Bad Boys II is one of Joel's favorites, he might like that on a shirt.

comments.author: Kirsten
comments.body:
57, 17, 22, 25 & 37
No particular order.....HILARIOUS!!!

comments.author: John
comments.body:
I like: 20, 46, 54 and a couple I made up on my own:

The Moxie: Let's bounce.

The Moxie: Like going to the movies, only better.

comments.author: John
comments.body: And I know I was supposed to keep it to the ones above, but I couldn't help myself.

comments.author: nathan
comments.body:
6 and 75

plus this should be one of the options:

what's an fuckass?
come to the moxie to find out

comments.author: mike
comments.body:
35, 34, 41 (but instead of 'Bad Boys II... maybe '2 Fast 2 Furious'), 48 & 77... yahoo for voting!

And might I suggest:

"Honestly, I have no idea what you were saying. All I'm interested in is the Moxie" (I heart Huckabees)

I can't read that quote without laughing... ahh... great movie.

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body:
Gotta be...

59. The Moxie: I knew you when you were Cinema24

...but I don't suppose that would be a great seller. Or 33, but making it...

Mighty Moxie, Showing Movie

I like 77 too. Some reference to your hat is vital as well, perhaps in addition to a main slogan?

comments.author: Surferbill
comments.body:
7, 8, 12, 29, 70.

And I can't help reading 11 as:
Fat Chicks dig The Moxie

I'm sure Freud would have something to say about that...

comments.author: louise
comments.body: where are my pictures?  I want to see my pictures!!!!! i love you bogey.

comments.author: Rachel
comments.body: Woohoo!  Mine is number 75!  Okay, anyway...I really think 15 is the best.  I have concerns about using the movie quotes.  Of course I'm all about posterity.  36 is good too, although it takes some thinking.  So is 26. I also like 9.

comments.author: Sam Spade
comments.body:
I concur with Rachel about using the movie quotes, more for legal reasons than anything. I also agree with her on 15. It sums it up nicely and only other blog readers would get the joke.

So I assume the highest votes from today go to the second round of "American Moxie Idol"?

comments.author: Tom G.- Ex Coworker
comments.body:
Dan,

I would say 3, 8, 40, 55, 77. But, you should not take anything I say seriously, I work at the big Publishing Company that Dan had the brains to leave. I'm an idiot.

take care Dan and Nicole
tom

comments.author: Brian
comments.body: I vote for 75 (second base), 81 (hat) and 27(map). The first two because they're relatable, indy flicks are the perfect place to run the bases and everyone forgets their damn hat at the theater. The map one because not only is it a funny Simpsons quote, The Moxie will parallel the monorail as a great economy booster to Springfield!

comments.author: Amy
comments.body:
I have to go with #42. He asked me to forcibly insert the Moxie into my anus.

It may not go over with all demographic groups on second thought....
